positive_examples: This is an example of gear oil.
The gear oil demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed gear oil in this context.
A typical case of gear oil would involve these features.
The concept of gear oil applies here.
A viscous lubricant specifically formulated for use in gear systems and transmissions.
negative_examples: This is an example of grease, not gear oil.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Grease, or other types of Lubricant

definition: A lubricant specifically formulated to protect gears and transmissions.
